By Trickster on Monday, April 17, 2006 - 10:04 pm:

I haven't yet figured out what the star does... I noticed it put out beams of light from the center of the ring, but I don't know what (if any) other effect it had.

Anyone?

By Minion9000 on Wednesday, April 19, 2006 - 08:10 pm:

The star boosts crowd satisfaction. I'll say 25 points since everytime I got it the little crowd icon changed to the next one up. I also think the MVP gets a additional stat boost.

By RPGDesigner on Thursday, April 20, 2006 - 12:01 am:

Now, exactly what does MVP stand for? And how does a monster become an MVP?

By Minion9000 on Thursday, April 20, 2006 - 07:01 am:

MVP = Most valuable player. If the monster pulls off the best trick (sorce wise and it will include like hidden ones above 100) it'll get it. I've had monsters get it doing only 1 trick when I had a couple do 2. (I usaually get 6 or 7 tricks a show) It's just the one monster will get like 18 points a trick then times that by 7 (prefecting advance and medium tricks) and you get 126 so that monster is usually my mvp.

By RPGDesigner on Thursday, April 20, 2006 - 02:50 pm:

I see.

Perhaps it's time to start posting subcode data?
